DOC.brief_summary: To demonstrate efficacy , safety tolerability 10 mg oral vardenafil ( BAY 38-9456 ) compare placebo period 12 week men erectile dysfunction ( ED )
DOC.brief_title: Assessment Vardenafil Patients With Erectile Dysfunction Asia
DOC.criteria: Age : 20 year old Males erectile dysfunction Stable heterosexual relationship Primary hypoactive sexual desire History myocardial infarction , stroke lifethreatening arrhythmia within prior 6 month Nitrate use Other exclusion criterion apply accord Summary Product Characteristics
